meanings.definition: A device used to automatically take photographs at set intervals.
meanings.sent1: I set up the intervalometer to capture the sunrise every morning.
meanings.sent2: The photographer used an intervalometer to create a time-lapse video of the blooming flowers.
meanings.sent3: The intervalometer decided to take a break right before the most important shot!
meanings.sent4: The intervalometer was like a diligent assistant, never missing a beat in capturing the changing scenery.
meanings.sent5: With the intervalometer in hand, the photographer could effortlessly document the passage of time.

meanings.definition: The function or feature on a camera that allows for automatic interval photography.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to activate the intervalometer if you want to take time-lapse photos.
meanings.sent2: The new camera model includes an advanced intervalometer for capturing motion sequences.
meanings.sent3: The intervalometer on the camera seemed to have a mind of its own, snapping pictures at unexpected moments.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like an intervalometer, capturing every detail of the bustling city street.
meanings.sent5: The intervalometer feature made it easy for beginners to experiment with time-lapse photography.
